Knicks take a 1-0 series lead. ‚Ä¢ Brunson 43-6-6, 14-14 FTs ‚Ä¢ Hart 24-13-8, 48 mins ‚Ä¢ DiVincenzo 25 & 3 ‚Ä¢ Anunoby 13 & 9 ‚Ä¢ Turner 23-2-3 Knicks shot 54-48-85. Pacers shot 52-39-79. We‚Äôre not expecting to get calls in here.It would be nice if they laid off that one, but they didn‚Äôt. That‚Äôs just the way it goes. We challenged it. They reviewed it. They‚Äôve got a bunch of people in New Jersey that agreed with them, so that‚Äôs just the way it goes.‚Äù pic.twitter.com/tx9dyi9vr3 Myles Turner says he's looking forward to L2M report tomorrow Tony East: ‚ÄúIn my experience in this league, I think it‚Äôs best when players decide the outcome of the game,‚Äù Myles Turner says.He added that the Pacers can‚Äôt leave the game to be decided by the refs, though he added he‚Äôs looking forwad to the Last 2 Minutes report coming out.
